growth_stage.title: Growth Stage
growth_stage.description:
Let's explore 
the 5 growth stages 
(from seed to harvest!)!

start_now.title: Start Now!
start_now.description:
Enjoy growing your plants, 
and don't miss sweet rewards!

main-hero.title:
Grow your own little friend,
Git-Plants
main-hero.subtitle:
Plant a commit, harvest a dream.
(based on your GitHub activity)

footer.description: Git-Plants is a personal project made for learning and portfolio purposes only.
footer.feedback: If you have any questions or feedback, feel free to drop an issue on

mode.title: Grow Your Garden Warm and Full ‚Äî with Two Unique Modes

miniMode.title: üåø Mini Mode
miniMode.description:
Care for a single plant, 
watch your seed grow in a calm & focused space, 
and enjoy a peaceful moment for yourself.

gardenMode.title: üèÖ Garden Mode
gardenMode.description:
Watch your whole garden come together. 
From every plant to every badge, 
it's your journey, grown one commit at a time.

reward.title: Harvest crops to collect seeds and decorate your own garden!
reward.description:
When you pick fruits or flowers, you‚Äôll earn seeds. 
Use them to buy backgrounds, pots, and special items. 
Collect them all and make your garden truly yours!

system.title-left:
Collect seeds 
to get various items!
system.title-right:
Harvest crops, collect seeds, 
and unlock badges!

how-it-works.title: How Your Contributions Help Plants Thrive
how-it-works.description:
Every contribution you make on GitHub helps grow your garden. 
Watch your plants grow and earn seeds as you engage!

tab.description1:
Build your contribution through
Pull Requests and Commits.
tab.description2:
Collect seeds to unlock new items 
as you progress in your gardening journey.
tab.description3:
Grow your garden through GitHub activity
and enjoy a meaningful coding experience!

cta.title: Start your journey today!
cta.subtitle: Join us and watch your garden grow, one seed at a time!

userInfo.noBadgeDescription: (Keep being active ‚Äî see what surprises show up!)
